63347.name: Against All Odds
63347.flavorText: Time to EVEN out the playing field.

63211.name: Altar of Fire
63211.text: Destroy the top 3 cards of each deck.
63211.flavorText: "I now pronounce you, Crispy and Fried."

62895.name: Apothecary Helbrim
62895.text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Add a random Poison to your hand.
62895.flavorText: The best way to maintain your health is to poison everyone else.

63193.name: Apothecary's Caravan
63193.text: At the start of your turn, summon a 1-Cost minion from your deck.
63193.flavorText: If you won't bring out your dead, we'll bring the dead to you.

63060.name: Arcane Luminary
63060.text: Cards that didn't start in your deck cost (2) less (but not less than 1).
63060.flavorText: They say true value is the cards you find along the way.

63432.name: Archdruid Naralex
63432.text: Dormant for 2 turns. While Dormant, add a Dream card to your hand at the end of your turn.

63072.name: Arid Stormer
63072.text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, gain Rush and Windfury.
63072.flavorText: Some people chase storms, some storms chase elementals.

63461.name: Barak Kodobane
63461.flavorText: They say he's a pro at horseback archery.

62582.name: Barrens Blacksmith
62582.flavorText: "Maybe someday you’ll make it to Gadgetzan, kid."

63217.name: Barrens Scavenger
63217.text: Taunt Costs (1) while your deck has 10 or fewer cards.
63217.flavorText: When the hundredth centaur dropped, so did her bracers.

63381.name: Barrens Trapper
63381.flavorText: Just add a bit of murloc meat for bait. Beasts can’t resist that special seasoning…

62587.name: Blademaster Samuro
62587.text: Rush Frenzy: Deal damage equal to this minion's Attack to all enemy minions.
62587.flavorText: Artists paint their visions meticulously on canvas. Blademasters paint with, uh, broader strokes.

63216.name: Blood Shard Bristleback
63216.text: Lifesteal. Battlecry: If your deck contains 10 or fewer cards, deal 6 damage to a minion.
63216.flavorText: I'm bringin' bristle back (Yeah) Those other minions don't know how to act (Yeah) I think it's special how these crystals crack (Yeah) So turn around and I'll give you a smack (Yeah) (Take 'em to the Barrens)

63074.name: Bru'kan
63074.flavorText: Bru'kan, his body weathered and weary, felt his time nearing its end. Teaching brave champions like Rokara gives him hope for a greater future.

63130.name: Bulk Up
63130.text: Give a random Taunt minion in your hand +1/+1 and copy it.
63130.flavorText: "For breakfast I usually go for a couple of kodo steaks, 5 Plainstrider eggs and an ice-cold milk to wash it down… all raw."

62581.name: Burning Blade Acolyte
62581.flavorText: Wields a disappointingly normal looking blade.

62976.name: Cannonmaster Smythe
62976.text: Battlecry: Transform your Secrets into 3/3 Soldiers. They transform back when they die.
62976.flavorText: "Smythe, it's been a real blast serving the Alliance with you."

62993.name: Cariel Roame
62993.text: Rush, Divine Shield Whenever this attacks, reduce the Cost of Holy spells in your hand by (1).
62993.flavorText: Cariel had pledged her honor to the Alliance, but when someone matching her long-lost sister's description was sighted at the Crossroads, Cariel did the unthinkable: she abandoned her post and set out across the Barrens.

63040.name: Celestial Alignment
63040.text: Set your Mana Crystals to 0. Set the Cost of cards in your hand and deck to (1).
63040.flavorText: "Is my deck any good?" "I mean, if the stars align."

63065.name: Chain Lightning (Rank 1)
63065.text: Deal 2 damage to a minion and a random adjacent one. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
63065.flavorText: Still better than receiving a chain letter.

63464.name: Cleric of An'she
63464.text: Battlecry: If you've restored Health this turn, Discover a spell from your deck.
63464.flavorText: When it's her turn to cook, she'll always go for a Light sear.

62878.name: Condemn (Rank 1)
62878.text: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
62878.flavorText: "I wished you no harm, but for your cruelty, by the light, I condemn you all!" Xyrella shouted, unaware that irony was not her strong suit.

63128.name: Conditioning (Rank 1)
63128.text: Give minions in your hand +1/+1. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
63128.flavorText: Now drop and give me 5 Mana.

62947.name: Conviction (Rank 1)
62947.text: Give a random friendly minion +3 Attack. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
62947.flavorText: It was the strength of Cariel's faith that emboldened the defenders of Northwatch that day. Although the strength of her giant hammer didn’t exactly hurt either.

63019.name: Crossroads Gossiper
63019.text: After a friendly Secret is revealed, gain +2/+2.
63019.flavorText: Not afraid to spill the tea.

62584.name: Crossroads Watch Post
62584.text: Can't attack. Whenever your opponent casts a spell, give your minions +1/+1.
62584.flavorText: All of Barrens Chat is recorded and kept on thousands of scrolls stored beneath this tower.

62745.name: Darkspear Berserker
62745.flavorText: "If I die, I'm taking my hero down with me."

63167.name: Death Speaker Blackthorn
63167.text: Battlecry: Summon 3 Deathrattle minions that cost (5) or less from your deck.
63167.flavorText: He can speak death but has a hard time reading it.

62744.name: Death's Head Cultist
62744.flavorText: Nothing can stop death. Except a Taunt. With Healing.

62873.name: Desperate Prayer
62873.flavorText: Woah, we're halfway there, woah oh...

63502.name: Deviate Dreadfang
63502.text: After you cast a Nature spell, summon a 4/2 Viper with Rush.
63502.flavorText: Even with wings, snakes STILL don't have legs.

63400.name: Devouring Ectoplasm
63400.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 2/2 Adventurer with a random bonus effect.
63400.flavorText: When it's on keto, it only devours tauren.

62875.name: Devouring Plague
62875.text: Lifesteal. Deal 4 damage randomly split among all enemy minions.
62875.flavorText: "How’d we miss this one in Uldum?" —Rafaam

63346.name: Devout Dungeoneer
63346.text: Battlecry: Draw a spell. If it's a Holy spell, reduce its Cost by (2).
63346.flavorText: "Please do smaller pulls, this is my first time healing."

63038.name: Druid of the Plains
63038.flavorText: Not to be confused with the aeronautically advanced Druid of the Planes.

63508.name: Earth Revenant
63508.text: Taunt Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions.
63508.flavorText: Have you guys seen a pair of rock legs lying around anywhere?

62891.name: Efficient Octo-bot
62891.text: Frenzy: Reduce the Cost of cards in your hand by (1).
62891.flavorText: Pull the lever, Octo-bot... Wrong leverrrrr!

63329.name: Fangbound Druid
63329.text: Taunt Deathrattle: Reduce the Cost of a Beast in your hand by (2).
63329.flavorText: Bound by the law of the fang, these druid floss their teeth twice a day.

62583.name: Far Watch Post
62583.text: Can't attack. After your opponent draws a card, it costs (1) more (up to 10).

63407.name: Felrattler
63407.text: Rush Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions.
63407.flavorText: It only rattles when YOU'RE in danger.

62888.name: Field Contact
62888.text: After you play a Battlecry or Combo card, draw a card.
62888.flavorText: That's not a knife... THIS is a knife!

63369.name: Final Gasp
63369.text: Deal 1 damage to a minion. If it dies, summon a 2/2 Adventurer with a random bonus effect.
63369.flavorText: And with a raspy whisper, he uttered his final words, "rez plz."

63272.name: Firemancer Flurgl
63272.text: After you play a Murloc, deal 1 damage to all enemies.

63520.name: Floecaster
63520.flavorText: His real name is Melvin, but he prefers his friends call him ... <sigh> ..."Floecaster."

62804.name: Flurry (Rank 1)
62804.text: Freeze a random enemy minion. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)

63058.name: Frostweave Dungeoneer
63058.text: Battlecry: Draw a spell. If it's a Frost spell, summon two 1/1 Elementals that Freeze.
63058.flavorText: It's a woven blanket of ice but surprisingly comforting.

63682.name: Fury (Rank 1)
63682.text: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
63682.flavorText: Rank 3 is when your mom uses your middle name.

63323.name: Galloping Savior
63323.text: Secret: After your opponent plays three cards in a turn, summon a 3/4 Steed with Taunt.
63323.flavorText: "Look to my coming on the first light of the third card."

62702.name: Gold Road Grunt
62702.text: Taunt Frenzy: Gain Armor equal to the damage taken.
62702.flavorText: No, no, no, Gold Roads are very different from Yellow Brick Roads.

63191.name: Grimoire of Sacrifice
63191.text: Destroy a friendly minion. Deal 2 damage to all enemy minions.
63191.flavorText: "What kind of bedtime story is this?"

63227.name: Guff Runetotem
63227.text: After you cast a Nature spell, give another friendly minion +2/+2.
63227.flavorText: "By the twins above and twins below, our companions will lead us through." —Guff Runetotem

63252.name: Hecklefang Hyena
63252.flavorText: Even their teeth are laughing at you.

62481.name: Hog Rancher
62481.flavorText: Suspiciously close to a Quilboar village.

63726.name: Horde Operative
63726.text: Battlecry: Copy your opponent's Secrets and put them into play.
63726.flavorText: "We all have our secrets. I mean, your secrets."

63220.name: Imp Swarm (Rank 1)
63220.text: Summon a 3/2 Imp. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
63220.flavorText: Not a cauldron, or a mischief, or a cackle, but a swarm.

62548.name: Injured Marauder
62548.flavorText: He’ll keep going despite the neighsayers.

63079.name: Invigorating Sermon
63079.text: Give +1/+1 to all minions in your hand, deck, and battlefield.
63079.flavorText: Every underdog sports coach knows this one.

62921.name: Judgment of Justice
62921.text: Secret: When an enemy minion attacks, set its Attack and Health to 1.
62921.flavorText: Look, we don't need a jury. We've got a paladin right here!

63215.name: Kabal Outfitter
63215.text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Give another random friendly minion +1/+1.
63215.flavorText: Don’t ask her for feathers on your necklace though.

62586.name: Kargal Battlescar
62586.text: Battlecry: Summon a 5/5 Lookout for each Watch Post you've summoned this game.
62586.flavorText: One if by land, two if by tree.

62588.name: Kazakus, Golem Shaper
62588.text: Battlecry: If your deck has no 4-Cost cards, build a custom Golem.
62588.flavorText: With a little love and some tenderness, we’ll CRUSH OUR FOES!

63277.name: Kindling Elemental
63277.text: Battlecry: The next Elemental you play costs (1) less.

63007.name: Kolkar Pack Runner
63007.text: After you cast a spell, summon a 1/1 Hyena with Rush.

63375.name: Kresh, Lord of Turtling
63375.text: Frenzy: Gain 8 Armor. Deathrattle: Equip a 2/5 Turtle Spike.

63260.name: Kurtrus Ashfallen
63260.text: Battlecry: Attack the left and right-most enemy minions. Outcast: Immune this turn.
63260.flavorText: Kurtrus fled the Black Temple, abandoning Illidan's cause, to seek revenge against the Dreadlord Anetheron.

63332.name: Lady Anacondra
63332.flavorText: Do you think she got her name before or after she turned into a snake?

62874.name: Lightshower Elemental
62874.text: Taunt Deathrattle: Restore 8 Health to all friendly characters.
62874.flavorText: The forecast calls for light showers, but you won’t need an umbrella.

63279.name: Lilypad Lurker
63279.text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, transform an enemy minion into a 0/1 Frog with Taunt.
63279.flavorText: Honestly, the frog did nothing wrong.

63030.name: Living Seed (Rank 1)
63030.text: Draw a Beast. Reduce its Cost by (1). (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
63030.flavorText: Every desert needs an oasis. And it's Guff's duty to make it happen.

62483.name: Lushwater Murcenary
62483.text: Battlecry: If you control a Murloc, gain +1/+1.
62483.flavorText: You can't just switch sides because they have more fish!

62484.name: Lushwater Scout
62484.text: After you summon a Murloc, give it +1 Attack and Rush.
62484.flavorText: Only knows how to play "Careless Murgl" and "Mrgl Mrgl Little Star."

63373.name: Man-at-Arms
63373.text: Battlecry: If you have a weapon equipped, gain +1/+1.

63591.name: Mankrik
63591.text: Battlecry: Help Mankrik find his wife! She was last seen somewhere in your deck.
63591.flavorText: Relives his nightmare every day a new Horde player is created.

63114.name: Mark of the Spikeshell
63114.text: Give a minion +2/+2. If it has Taunt, add a copy of it to your hand.
63114.flavorText: "I'm DEFINITELY turtle-y enough for the turtle club."

63396.name: Meeting Stone
63396.text: At the end of your turn, add a 2/2 Adventurer with a random bonus effect to your hand.
63396.flavorText: "I'm clicking on it, but nothing's happening."

63124.name: Mor'shan Elite
63124.text: Taunt. Battlecry: If your hero attacked this turn, summon a copy of this.
63124.flavorText: "Fear not the orc who has slain a million training dummies, but the orc who keeps CAMPING MY CORPSE!"

62585.name: Mor'shan Watch Post
62585.text: Can't attack. After your opponent plays a minion, summon a 2/2 Grunt.
62585.flavorText: Pushing into Ashenvale made this post uneventful.

63064.name: Mordresh Fire Eye
63064.text: Battlecry: If you've dealt 10 damage with your Hero Power this game, deal 10 damage to all enemies. ( left!) (Ready!)
63064.flavorText: You're not hardcore unless you died hardcore.

63398.name: Mutanus the Devourer
63398.text: Battlecry: Eat a minion in your opponent's hand. Gain its stats.
63398.flavorText: As long as Naralex stays under the blanket, Mutanus can't get him.

63219.name: Neeru Fireblade
63219.text: Battlecry: If your deck is empty, open a portal that fills your board with 3/2 Imps each turn.
63219.flavorText: Look at this guy! He’s obviously evil! OBVIOUSLY!!!

63069.name: Nofin Can Stop Us
63069.text: Give your minions +1/+1. Give your Murlocs an extra +1/+1.
63069.flavorText: "I'm having a good time! I don't want to stop at all!"

62927.name: Northwatch Commander
62927.text: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, draw a minion.
62927.flavorText: It was all going well until some Horde had the cunning idea of attacking from the south.

63553.name: Oasis Ally
63553.text: Secret: When a friendly minion is attacked, summon a 3/6 Water Elemental.

62705.name: Oasis Thrasher
62705.text: Frenzy: Deal 3 damage to the enemy hero.
62705.flavorText: Didn't get tickets for E.T.C.'s show.

62887.name: Oil Rig Ambusher
62887.text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage. If this entered your hand this turn, deal 4 instead.

63118.name: Outrider's Axe
63118.text: After your hero attacks and kills a minion, draw a card.
63118.flavorText: "I only have to get 4 Zhevra hooves? How hard could that be?"

63274.name: Overlord Saurfang
63274.text: Battlecry: Resurrect 2 friendly Frenzy minions. Deal 1 damage to all other minions.
63274.flavorText: Eats more than his fair share of sour candy.

62750.name: Pack Kodo
62750.flavorText: He looks simple, but there’s a lot to unpack.

62892.name: Paralytic Poison
62892.text: Give your weapon +1 Attack and "Your hero is Immune while attacking."

63102.name: Party Up!
63102.text: Summon five 2/2 Adventurers with random bonus effects.
63102.flavorText: Random? But what if we don't get a tank?

62703.name: Peon
62703.text: Frenzy: Add a random spell from your class to your hand.
62703.flavorText: Joke's on the peon: the job's never done.

63098.name: Perpetual Flame
63098.text: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy minion. If it dies, recast this. Overload: (1)
63098.flavorText: Flame is perpetual.* *Perpetual only applies to current turn.

62812.name: Piercing Shot
62812.text: Deal 6 damage to a minion. Excess damage hits the enemy hero.
62812.flavorText: Goblins hate wasting money on unnecessary ammunition.

63042.name: Plaguemaw the Rotting
63042.text: After a friendly minion with Taunt dies, summon a new copy of it without Taunt.
63042.flavorText: This is why you should brush your teeth three times a day!

62872.name: Power Word: Fortitude
62872.text: Give a minion +3/+5. Costs (1) less for each spell in your hand.

63027.name: Pride's Fury
63027.flavorText: Day 4: I think they're starting to suspect.

62877.name: Priest of An'she
62877.text: Taunt. Battlecry: If you've restored Health this turn, gain +3/+3.

63331.name: Primal Dungeoneer
63331.text: Battlecry: Draw a spell. If it's a Nature spell, also draw an Elemental.
63331.flavorText: They wanted a Mature Dungeoneer. Instead they got this.

63070.name: Primordial Protector
63070.text: Battlecry: Draw your highest Cost spell. Summon a random minion with the same Cost.
63070.flavorText: I thought the "shape of water" meant something else.

62813.name: Prospector's Caravan
62813.text: At the start of your turn, give all minions in your hand +1/+1.
62813.flavorText: Prospectors came from all around in the Golden Legendary Rush of '49.

63119.name: Rancor
63119.text: Deal 2 damage to all minions. Gain 2 Armor for each destroyed.
63119.flavorText: Wise men say "Only fools rush in." Wise Orcs say the opposite.

62482.name: Ratchet Privateer
62482.flavorText: There's a fine line between privateering and pirating. It comes down to tax breaks.

63163.name: Razorboar
63163.text: Deathrattle: Summon a Deathrattle minion that costs (3) or less from your hand.
63163.flavorText: And this little pig built his house out of VENGEANCE.

63164.name: Razorfen Beastmaster
63164.text: Deathrattle: Summon a Deathrattle minion that costs (4) or less from your hand.
63164.flavorText: It's a homebrew variant on my favorite role-playing game.

63033.name: Razormane Battleguard
63033.text: The first Taunt minion you play each turn costs (2) less.
63033.flavorText: Where there's a quill, there's a way.

62701.name: Razormane Raider
62701.flavorText: "Call me hedgehog one more time. I dare you."

63059.name: Reckless Apprentice
63059.text: Battlecry: Fire your Hero Power at all enemies.
63059.flavorText: It’s all a great learning experience until someone accidentally aggros the boss.

63057.name: Refreshing Spring Water
63057.text: Draw 2 cards. Refresh 2 Mana Crystals for each spell drawn.

63112.name: Rimetongue
63112.text: After you cast a Frost spell, summon a 1/1 Elemental that Freezes.
63112.flavorText: Warriors are red, Frost spells are blue, If you're being hit by a weapon, Rimetongue's got you.

63125.name: Rokara
63125.text: Rush After a friendly minion attacks and survives, give it +1/+1.
63125.flavorText: "Tread carefully, but stand tall, and stand together. For strength and honor!" —Rokara

63056.name: Runed Orb
63056.flavorText: The most dangerous Winter Veil ornament.

63359.name: Savory Deviate Delight
63359.text: Transform a minion in both players' hands into a Pirate or Stealth minion.
63359.flavorText: "Savory" is a creative way to put it.

63517.name: Scabbs Cutterbutter
63517.text: Combo: The next two cards you play this turn cost (3) less.
63517.flavorText: "Never lie, steal, cheat, or drink. Unless you're compelled to, that is…" —Scabbs Cutterbutter

63099.name: Seedcloud Buckler
63099.flavorText: A shield to some, a frisbee to others (mainly dogs).

63397.name: Selfless Sidekick
63397.text: Battlecry: Equip a random weapon from your deck.
63397.flavorText: "I got a real sense of humility from her when she bashed that quilboar's head in."

62879.name: Serena Bloodfeather
62879.text: Battlecry: Choose an enemy minion. Steal Attack and Health from it until this has more.
62879.flavorText: She’s really into networking! After all, she’s introduced countless low-level Horde players to the Spirit Healer.

62176.name: Shadow Hunter Vol'jin
62176.text: Battlecry: Choose a minion. Swap it with a random one in its owner's hand.
62176.flavorText: You wouldn’t see this swap-meet on the Zandalari Roadshow.

63515.name: Shattering Blast
63515.flavorText: Let's be honest, they weren't going to unfreeze anyway.

63358.name: Shroud of Concealment
63358.text: Draw 2 minions. Any played this turn gain Stealth for 1 turn.

62845.name: Sigil of Flame
62845.text: At the start of your next turn, deal 3 damage to all minions.
62845.flavorText: "Huh, it reads F-I-R-E. Wonder what that means?"

63467.name: Sigil of Silence
63467.text: At the start of your next turn, Silence all enemy minions.

63264.name: Sigil of Summoning
63264.text: At the start of your next turn, summon two 2/2 Demons with Taunt.
63264.flavorText: Look, summoning ain’t exactly a science. Sometimes it takes a turn.

62889.name: Silverleaf Poison
62889.text: Give your weapon "After your hero attacks, draw a card."
62889.flavorText: Kazakus has taken to a more direct approach in recent times.

63690.name: Soldier's Caravan
63690.text: At the start of your turn, summon two 1/1 Silver Hand Recruits.
63690.flavorText: It’s a clown car… for JUSTICE!

62876.name: Soothsayer's Caravan
62876.text: At the start of your turn, copy a spell from your opponent's deck to your hand.
62876.flavorText: With tusks like those, you might call her a "Toothsayer."

63192.name: Soul Rend
63192.text: Deal 5 damage to all minions. Destroy a card in your deck for each killed.
63192.flavorText: About as close to feeling guilt as a warlock's ever going to get.

62515.name: South Coast Chieftain
62515.text: Battlecry: If you control another Murloc, deal 2 damage.
62515.flavorText: It got the conch. You let it speak!

63380.name: Southsea Scoundrel
63380.text: Battlecry: Discover a card in your opponent's deck. They draw theirs as well.
63380.flavorText: "…and here we see the Southsea Scoundrel in their natural habitat: a den of scum and villainy."

63509.name: Spawnpool Forager
63509.flavorText: Putting food on the table requires persistence, enthusiasm, and the finest murloc Gloves of Foraging.

63251.name: Spirit Healer
63251.text: After you cast a Holy spell, give a random friendly minion +2 Health.
63251.flavorText: "You again? What did I tell you about trying to fight ALL the quilboars."

63370.name: Stealer of Souls
63370.text: The first card you draw each turn costs Health instead of Mana.
63370.flavorText: The tooth fairy gig didn't work out.

63701.name: Stonemaul Anchorman
63701.flavorText: "Brug will read anything you put on the parchment prompter. Anything."

62811.name: Sunscale Raptor
62811.text: Frenzy: Shuffle a Sunscale Raptor into your deck with permanent +2/+1.
62811.flavorText: And they don't stop coming and they don't stop coming and they don't stop coming and they don't stop coming and they don't stop coming and they don't stop coming and they—

62706.name: Sunwell Initiate
62706.flavorText: Initiates don’t study pronunciation until level 20.

62893.name: Swinetusk Shank
62893.text: After you play a Poison, gain +1 Durability.
62893.flavorText: Comes with a rack of ribs!

62926.name: Sword of the Fallen
62926.text: After your hero attacks, cast a Secret from your deck.
62926.flavorText: Hoarding secrets is no fun, so play each and every one.

63230.name: Taintheart Tormenter
63230.flavorText: Oh boo hoo, did someone's World Tree burn down?

62485.name: Talented Arcanist
62485.text: Battlecry: Your next spell this turn has Spell Damage +2.
62485.flavorText: "Ey mon, you don't get this good just on raw talent ... but it helps."

63002.name: Tame Beast (Rank 1)
63002.text: Summon a 2/2 Beast with Rush. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
63002.flavorText: "Trust me laddie, I never eat seafood!"

63218.name: Tamsin Roame
63218.text: Whenever you cast a Shadow spell that costs (1) or more, add a copy to your hand that costs (0).
63218.flavorText: In life, Tamsin Roame was one of the Alliance's most promising mages; now she is the Horde's most dangerous warlock.

62550.name: Taurajo Brave
62550.flavorText: "He's brave, but splinters will make any Tauren cry."

63010.name: Tavish Stormpike
63010.text: After a friendly Beast attacks, summon a Beast from your deck that costs (1) less.
63010.flavorText: "Hurry up, laddie, we're getting overrun! Serpents everywhere! They may look cute, but do ye see the fury in their eyes?!" —Tavish Stormpike

63029.name: Thickhide Kodo
63029.flavorText: The introduction of professions was devastating for kodo populations.

63021.name: Thorngrowth Sentries
63021.flavorText: Maybe we shouldn't drink from this Oasis…

63071.name: Tinyfin's Caravan
63071.text: At the start of your turn, draw a Murloc.
63071.flavorText: Movin' right along, mrgl mrg mrgl mrg.

63250.name: Toad of the Wilds
63250.text: Taunt Battlecry: If you're holding a Nature spell, gain +2 Health.
63250.flavorText: "Someday we'll find it. The Oasis Connection. The peons, the caravans, and me."

63229.name: Tuskpiercer
63229.flavorText: It's the Barrens, everything has tusks! The Quilboar have tusks, the boars have tusks, the tusks have tusks.

63368.name: Unstable Shadow Blast
63368.text: Deal 6 damage to a minion. Excess damage hits your hero.

63261.name: Varden Dawngrasp
63261.text: Battlecry: Freeze all enemy minions. If any are already Frozen, deal 4 damage to them instead.
63261.flavorText: Varden Dawngrasp could wield fire, summon hailstorms, and morph a night elf into a sheep with a snap of their fingers. Knowing how malleable reality could be, certain labels felt downright trivial.

63166.name: Vengeful Spirit
63166.flavorText: Sheesh, even the spirits are edgy when it comes to Demon Hunters.

62486.name: Venomous Scorpid
62486.flavorText: Despite what Guff says, he is NOT a "nice little guy."

63632.name: Venomstrike Bow
63632.flavorText: "You know you only have to coat the arrowhead in poison and not the entire bow, right?"

62933.name: Veteran Warmedic
62933.text: After you cast a Holy spell, summon a 2/2 Medic with Lifesteal.
62933.flavorText: In times of war, warmedics bring their own medics.

63165.name: Vile Call
63165.flavorText: "We're calling to inform you that your vehicle's insurance is about to expire."

62871.name: Void Flayer
62871.text: Battlecry: For each spell in your hand, deal 1 damage to a random enemy minion.
62871.flavorText: The Void, just like onions, has flayers.

63073.name: Wailing Vapor
63073.text: After you play an Elemental, gain +1 Attack.
63073.flavorText: If you have The Vapors, your Humors might be imbalanced.

63117.name: Warsong Envoy
63117.text: Frenzy: Gain +1 Attack for each damaged character.
63117.flavorText: "What do you mean we didn’t give the flag to the Druid?"

63088.name: Warsong Wrangler
63088.text: Battlecry: Discover a Beast from your deck. Give all copies of it +2/+1 (wherever they are).
63088.flavorText: "Me? Playing favorites? I love my beasts all the same!"

63357.name: Water Moccasin
63357.text: Stealth Has Poisonous while you have no other minions.
63357.flavorText: You need to be specific when you're ordering waterproof shoewear.

63374.name: Whetstone Hatchet
63374.text: After your hero attacks, give a minion in your hand +1 Attack.
63374.flavorText: A bad hatchet can make a good spear better.

63126.name: Whirling Combatant
63126.text: Battlecry and Frenzy: Deal 1 damage to all other minions.
63126.flavorText: It's called capoeira! And yes, it is dangerous!

62890.name: Wicked Stab (Rank 1)
62890.text: Deal 2 damage. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
62890.flavorText: Always go for the glowing weak point.

63062.name: Wildfire
63062.text: Your Hero Power deals 1 more damage this game.
63062.flavorText: The Barrens were a lush jungle. Then this happened.

63195.name: Wound Prey
63195.text: Deal 1 damage. Summon a 1/1 Hyena with Rush.
63195.flavorText: You steal the cranberry juice, you pay the price.

63188.name: Xyrella
63188.text: Battlecry: If you've restored Health this turn, deal that much damage to all enemy minions.
63188.flavorText: On the Night of Falling Stars, Xyrella had a vision of a shattered naaru. "Go to the Barrens," the being said. "Seek the shards of my broken body. Restore me, and I will restore your daughter."

62894.name: Yoink!
62894.text: Discover a Hero Power and set its Cost to (0). Swap back after 2 uses.
62894.flavorText: Saying the spell’s name makes it work better.
